text: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّجۡرِمِينَ

translation.en: But as for those who disbelieved, [it will be said], "Were not Our verses recited to you, but you were arrogant and became a people of criminals
translation.id: Sedangkan (kepada) orang-orang yang kafir (difirmankan), "Bukankah ayat-ayat-Ku telah dibacakan kepadamu, tetapi kamu menyombongkan diri dan kamu menjadi orang-orang yang berbuat dosa
